ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep the Chant still has full effect on the charmed mob.  They basically just sit there and wait to die. ... From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@carsinfo.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Yep the Chant still has full effect on the charmed mob. They basically just
sit there and wait to die.

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 11:49 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros



>
The macro lays the Chant, Charms the mob, and
sits the pet. When the pet gets back up I know to reapply the hotkey.
>

Interesting. While the mob is charmed, does Chant still damage it?

I had thought of trying this, but dismissed it, thinking that after
charming, subsequent pulses of Chant wouldn't have any effect.



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
